column4: Ran across several people complaining they have to manual start bluetooth to get headset to work or to connect to ubuntu
Here may be a better way to start this bluetooth idea... http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=1463610&highlight=bluetooth+headset+sound+issue
hold on cooking be right back...
Here is the link... https://help.ubuntu.com/community/BluetoothAudio  For short it is the tool used to see the devices it scans in bluetooth
The problem is the bluetooth devices in 11.04 are dropping connectioon so some are manually forcing connection with the same result of a lost signal..
